changeSet.author: fedormichal
changeSet.sql: create table cars ( id bigint not null AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, vin varchar(255), productionYear integer, brand varchar(255), model varchar(255), mileage int, registration varchar(255), isAvailable boolean, deleted boolean default false );

changeSet.author: fedormichal
changeSet.sql: create table rents ( id bigint not null AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, dateFrom date, dateTo date, status varchar(255), carId bigint, userId bigint, startMileage int, endMileage int, deleted boolean default false );

changeSet.author: fedormichal
changeSet.sql: create table users ( id bigint not null AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, name varchar(255), surname varchar(255), personId varchar(255), phoneNumber bigint, email varchar(255), deleted boolean default false, UNIQUE (personId) );

changeSet.author: fedormichal
changeSet.sql: create table importStatus ( id bigint not null AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, entity varchar(255), submitTime datetime not null, fileName varchar(255) not null, status varchar(255) not null, failedReason varchar(255), deleted boolean default false );
